name: Save The Bomb
description: Save the bomb is an arcade survival game. Earn score by jumping into platforms and collecting green pellets. Every 5 green pellets that you will collect you will experience a time limited power up, it is either unli jump or speed up. The bomb has a limited lifetime and will explode once the time is up. You will lose the game if you fall or if the bomb explodes. Find the way on how to change the color of your bomb.
